# believe_matches (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_matches" "example_matches" {
  match_type = "league"
  result = "win"
  team_id = "team_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `match_type` (String) Filter by match type
Available values: "league", "cup", "friendly", "playoff", "final".
- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `result` (String) Filter by result
Available values: "win", "loss", "draw", "pending".
- `team_id` (String) Filter by team (home or away)

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `attendance` (Number) Match attendance
- `away_score` (Number) Away team score
- `away_team_id` (String) Away team ID
- `date` (String) Match date and time
- `episode_id` (String) Episode ID where this match is featured
- `home_score` (Number) Home team score
- `home_team_id` (String) Home team ID
- `id` (String) Unique identifier
- `lesson_learned` (String) The life lesson learned from this match
- `match_type` (String) Type of match
Available values: "league", "cup", "friendly", "playoff", "final".
- `possession_percentage` (Number) Home team possession percentage
- `result` (String) Match result from home team perspective
Available values: "win", "loss", "draw", "pending".
- `ted_halftime_speech` (String) Ted's inspirational halftime speech
- `ticket_revenue_gbp` (String) Total ticket revenue in GBP
- `turning_points` (Attributes List) Key moments that changed the match (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--turning_points))
- `weather_temp_celsius` (Number) Temperature at kickoff in Celsius

<a id="nestedatt--items--turning_points"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.turning_points`

Read-Only:

- `character_involved` (String) Character ID who was central to this moment
- `description` (String) What happened
- `emotional_impact` (String) How this affected the team emotionally
- `minute` (Number) Minute of the match
